remarks: Distribute proper substitution through a membership relation. (Contributed by NM, 10-Nov-2005.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 29-Jun-2011.)  Obsolete as of 18-Aug-2018.  Use ~ sbcel12 instead. (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement: sbcel12gOLD $p |- ( A e. V -> ( [. A / x ]. B e. C <-> [_ A / x ]_ B e. [_ A / x ]_ C ) ) $.
